mapper.sql: id, user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, product_type_id AS productTypeId, product_cupon_id AS productCuponId, order_num AS orderNum, order_total_price AS orderTotalPrice, order_real_price AS orderRealPrice, post_way_type AS postWayType, post_date_id AS postDateId, consume_point AS consumePoint, message, order_status AS orderStatus, pay_status AS payStatus, pay_way AS payWay, remark, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, delete_flag AS deleteFlag, address_id AS addressId
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as num FROM wwq_pay as sp WHERE sp.user_id = #{userId} AND sp.pay_status = #{orderStatus} AND sp.deleteFlag = 0

SELECT o.user_id as userId,u.nickname as nickName, p.product_name as productName,o.product_id as productId, o.id as orderId,o.order_num as orderNum,o.order_total_price as orderTotalNum, o.post_way_type as postWayType,o.order_status as orderStatus,o.pay_status as payStatus,o.create_date as createDate, d.post_date_name as postDate,a.address,o.message from wwq_order o left join wwq_user u on u.id=o.user_id left join wwq_product p on p.id=o.product_id left join wwq_address a on a.id=o.address_id left join wwq_post_date d on d.id=o.post_date_id where o.delete_flag=0
and p.product_name like '%${productName}%'

SELECT o.user_id as userId,u.nickname as nickName, p.product_name as productName,o.product_id as productId, o.id as orderId,o.order_num as orderNum,o.order_total_price as orderTotalNum, o.post_way_type as postWayType,o.order_status as orderStatus,o.pay_status as payStatus,o.create_date as createDate, d.post_date_name as postDate,a.address,o.message from wwq_order o left join wwq_user u on u.id=o.user_id left join wwq_product p on p.id=o.product_id left join wwq_address a on a.id=o.address_id left join wwq_post_date d on d.id=o.post_date_id where o.delete_flag=0 and o.id =#{id}
